text: Thomas Bigge (1766–1851) was an English political writer and partner in the goldsmiths Rundell, Bridge & Co. Thomas Bigge may also refer to: *Thomas Charles Bigge (1739–1794), English landowner, cousin of Thomas Bigge *Thomas Hanway Bigge (1776–1824), English banker, son of Thomas Charles Bigge
title: Thomas Bigge (disambiguation)
